org.transitime.core

Class VehicleState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.core.VehicleState

  • public class VehicleState
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of vehicle state including its block assignment, where it last matched to its assignment, and AVL reports.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

      • getPreviousToLastMatch

        public TemporalMatch getPreviousToLastMatch()
        Returns the next to last temporal match. Returns null if there isn't one. Useful for when need to compare the previous to last match with the last one, such as for determining if vehicle has transversed any stops.
        Returns:

      • getLastAvlReport

        public AvlReport getLastAvlReport()
        Returns the last AvlReport. Returns null if there isn't one.

        Returns:

      • avlHasDifferentBlock

        public boolean avlHasDifferentBlock(AvlReport avlReport)
        Returns true if the AVL report has a different block assignment than what is in the VehicleState. For when reassigning a vehicle via the AVL feed.
        Parameters:
        avlReport -
        Returns:

      • getMatches

        public java.util.List<TemporalMatch> getMatches()
        Returns an unmodifiable list of the match history. The most recent one is first. The size of the list will be not greater than MATCH_HISTORY_SIZE.
        Returns:
        the match history

        public void setVehicleAtStopInfo(VehicleAtStopInfo vehicleAtStopInfo)

      • getVehicleAtStopInfo

        public VehicleAtStopInfo getVehicleAtStopInfo()
        Note: this is different from whether the SpatialMatch is currently at a stop. The SpatialMatch simply looks at the current stop indicated by the path index to determine if it is at that stop. But vehicleAtStopInfo keeps track of which stop the vehicle is on with respect to arrivals/departures. It could match to a previous stop if the allowable distance after the stop is large, such as for a terminal.
        Returns:

      • setPredictions

        public void setPredictions(java.util.List<Prediction> predictions)
        Sets the current list of predictions for the vehicle to the predictions parameter.
